Job Description: Job Description         Splunk Developer who can build and maintain a Splunk Enterprise clustered environment.        Build dashboards, reports, and alerts for the monitoring in Splunk.        Must have 3-4 years experience working and specializing in Splunk        MLTK Splunk Machine learning and AI - Must        Knows about base searches and core functionality of Splunk.        3-4 years of hands-on expert level development experience in Core Java, J2EE        Configure/Managing source types, Indexer- Cluster Master.        Perform Enterprise Linux tasks as they pertain to supporting the Splunk application.        Must be aware of Master/Slave architecture        Building a Splunk environment for new customers, cleanup of the Splunk instances -both search head cluster build and indexer cluster build, search peer registration        View Splunk logs for troubleshooting - must be well versed with Splunk SPL, Linux commands        Troubleshoot technical issues to establish the root cause of problems and form a solution or workaround across a range of environments        Quick Learner and work independently
